meta.title: About Wendogo - Your Partner for Studying in France
meta.description: Discover the Wendogo team and our mission: to support you with expertise and care in your study project in France.

hero.title: Who Are We?
hero.description: Wendogo is a passionate team of international education experts who fully understand the challenges you face. We are your trusted partners in making your dream of studying in France come true.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Passionate experts who put their experience and care at the service of your success.

edgar.name: Edgar Kamdem
edgar.description: Engineer and entrepreneur passionate about international education. Edgar created Wendogo after experiencing the difficulties of study abroad procedures.

advisors.name: Advisory Team
advisors.description: A team of experienced advisors, former international students, who perfectly understand the challenges you face.

livedExperience.title: Lived Experience
livedExperience.description: Our advisors have themselves experienced studying abroad

recognizedExpertise.title: Recognized Expertise
recognizedExpertise.description: Continuous training and certification on French procedures

humanSupport.title: Human Support
humanSupport.description: Listening, empathy, and support throughout your journey

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: What sets us apart and makes us your best allies to succeed in your study project in France.

personalizedSupport.title: Personalized Support
personalizedSupport.description: Every student is unique. Our advisors take the time to understand your profile, goals, and constraints to offer you tailor-made support.

recognizedExpertise.title: Recognized Expertise
recognizedExpertise.description: Our team has a perfect command of the French education system, administrative procedures, and institution expectations.

supportiveCare.title: Caring Follow-up
supportiveCare.description: We support you with empathy and care, understanding the emotional challenges of your study project.

extensiveNetwork.title: Extensive Network
extensiveNetwork.description: Through our network of partners and alumni, we open doors for you and facilitate your integration.

campusFrance.title: üè´ Campus France
campusFrance.description: Personalized support from A to Z

installation.title: üè† Settlement
installation.description: Support for your arrival and integration

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Wendogo was born from a personal frustration that turned into a mission: to facilitate access to higher education in France.

origin.title: Wendogo's Origin
origin.paragraph1: It all started with Edgar Kamdem, an engineer passionate about education, who experienced the difficulties of administrative procedures for helping his loved ones travel and supporting them in their studies abroad.
origin.paragraph2: Seeing that many talented students were giving up their dreams due to the complexity of procedures, Edgar decided to create a solution to democratize access to studies in France.
origin.paragraph3: Thus, Wendogo was born from this desire to simplify, support, and succeed together.

2020.title: Wendogo's Creation
2020.description: Birth of the idea following difficulties encountered by the founders

2021.title: First Supported Students
2021.description: Official launch with first guidance services

2022.title: Service Expansion
2022.description: Addition of visa support and partnerships with schools

2023.title: National Recognition
2023.description: Wendogo becomes a reference for studies in France

2024.title: Continuous Innovation
2024.description: New tools and services to optimize your experience

cta.title: Ready to Team Up with Us?
cta.description: Join the Wendogo community and benefit from the support of experts who truly understand your project.
